domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @marcorubio Are you really that stupid?  Pneumonia and other conditions are a direct result of COVID19.  Yeah, I guess you are that stupid.  Stop making the pandemic political.  The @GOP is a disgraceful sham of an organization that doesn’t care about people.  Shameful and stupid!
